description.value: You can communicate with your sacred animal (see @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-ancestries-demigods.journals-dnd5e.JournalEntry.CqQoQpvqEOehOwgL.JournalEntryPage.ITImTyYjZ91IQtQx#building-a-religion]{Building a Religion}), and you get along especially well with them. You can speak with your sacred animals and very similar animals (for instance, if your sacred animal is a bumblebee bat, you could also speak with other types of bats) as if you shared a language. In addition, you have Advantage on Charisma ability checks made to Influence such creatures.
